content: k2tog k1 sm k to next m sm k1 ssk k to end of round round 2 knit repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 56 60 64 68 72 76 stitches total or stitch count preferred for fit continue to knit in stocking stitch until foot of sock is 4 cm / 1 5 shorter than desired length toe shaping round 1 beginning at first marker placed when working the gusset shaping k1 ssk k to 3 sts before next m k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until there are 16 18 20 22 24 26 sts on needles ending after round 2 graft toe sts together weave in ends and block © caroline sommerfeld 2024 4
